column4: so i heard linux is pretty virus free should i still purchase a antivirus/spyware/malware software?
im new to linux and only used windows for school/ and mild gaming so I still have a lot to learn
thank you I wills tart reading after this weekend.  Have a midterm monday AHHHH
If you want to play games, you should get Wine. You won't need any Antivirus programs, but if you just need to get one, try ClamAV and KlamAV
